title: When Graveyards Yawn - FREE EBOOK BY G.WELLS TAYLOR
description:
Why is G. Wells Taylor giving When Graveyards Yawn away? He wants people to read his book. He wants lots of people to read it, and free is the best way to  do that. This book needs a big audience. Take it, read it. Send it to a friend  or  an  enemy. G. Wells Taylor has other books you might enjoy too. You  can  buy those at gwellstaylor.com. But try the free one first. That&#039;s what he would do!

In When Graveyards Yawn the Change has come. People stopped aging, the dead rose  from  their  graves,  it  started  raining and it&#039;s been raining ever since.  A  dead  lawyer  enters  the office of Wildclown Investigations and hires the detective  to  find his killer. Wildclown and his dead sidekick Elmo  are  soon  entangled  in a battle for control of a secret that offers either hope or doom for humanity. 

When Graveyards Yawn takes the reader to a unique setting that mixes gothic horror with the two-fisted pragmatism of a hard-boiled detective novel. 

Visit G. Wells Taylor at www.gwellstaylor.com & www.wildclown.com
